title: Stock market news live updates: Stock futures drift higher as traders brace for Fed decision - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stock futures drift higher as traders brace for Fed decision  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stock futures opened little changed Tuesday evening, with investors looking ahead to the Federal Reserve's latest monetary policy decision against the backdrop of elevated inflation and a still-tight U.S. labor market. Contracts on the S&P 500 and Nasdaq gained, while Dow futures dipped.
